page.title: 07Hartlepool Public Transport
page.content: Public transport in Hartlepool is covered by train, bus, coach, taxi and private hire vehicles. Hartlepool has one railway station situated behind Church Street. The destinations of the trains include Seaton Carew, Thornaby, Eaglescliffe, Middlesbrough, Stockton, Darlington, Seaham,Sunderland and Newcastle. Newcastle and Darlington are the main stations which connect to main line routes. Even though Hartlepool is served by six different bus companies it only has one main, small bus station, owned by the United Automobile Services Ltd. The bus companies operating in Hartlepool are:- Hartlepool Borough Transport, Cleveland Transit, United Bus Company, Trimdon Motor Services, National Express & Northern General Transport.
